P99V285_2H.txt - 81MHz Engine speed 

horizontal readout speeds:
 13.5MHz - 6 lines


History:
	First draft based on 285JCS pattern
	PDM moved from 33 (shutter) to 20
	SHD changed to be high during verticals since it is active low
	CMG increased the duty cycle and then remove a bit with special verniers (see datasheet)
	//labels are temporary left at 12.5 instead of 13.5Mhz because it is hardware in code
	Included BL-clamp routine. This enables Amp Restore but disables Black level clamp in AFE
	Changed Vertical Shift routines to 8 lines to produce 0.9us vertical shift speed.

SEL = over-pulse (PD transfer) on IAG2, permanently low on 285.
PDM = AFE CLPDM, Cmamp Clk at signal input
POB = AFE CLPOB, Black Level Clamp Clk (amp restore on other systems)
HD = AFE HD, Horz Drive
VD = AFE VD, Vert Drive (driven by frame, mem32, not used)
BLK = AFE PBLK, preblanking Clk
ADC = AFE DATACLK
SHD = AFE CCD data sample
ODB = pulse high for global clear using anti-blooming structure.
SHP = AFE CCD ref sample

****************************************************************************************
00000000	11111100	22221111	33222222	33333333	44444444
76543210	54321098	32109876	10987654	98765432	76543210

SSIBSSSS 	IS----R- 	---PP--- 	C-- R--- 	--FH-B-F 	ASROS-P- 
122 PPPP     	1E    S  	   DO    	M   1    	  ID L R 	DH2DH X
    3210     	 L    T  	   MB    	G        	  R  K A 	CD BP L
<VS-st>
01100000	10000010	00011000	00001001	00000110	01001000
01100000	10000010	00011000	00001001	00000110	01001000
00100000	10000010	00011000	00001001	00000110	01001000
00100000	10000010	00011000	00001001	00000110	01001000
10100000	10000010	00011000	00001001	00000110	01001000
10100000	10000010	00011000	00001001	00000110	01001000
11100000	10000010	00011000	00001001	00000110	01001000
11110000	10000010	00011000	00001001	00000110	01001000
<\VS-st>

same as VS-st, for compatibility with master file for iXon 285
<VS-sth>
01100000	10000010	00011000	00001001	00000110	01001000
01100000	10000010	00011000	00001001	00000110	01001000
00100000	10000010	00011000	00001001	00000110	01001000
00100000	10000010	00011000	00001001	00000110	01001000
10100000	10000010	00011000	00001001	00000110	01001000
10100000	10000010	00011000	00001001	00000110	01001000
11100000	10000010	00011000	00001001	00000110	01001000
11110000	10000010	00011000	00001001	00000110	01001000
<\VS-st>

<VS-all>
01100000	00000010	00011000	00001001	00000110	01001000
01100000	00000010	00011000	00001001	00000110	01001000
00000000	00000010	00011000	00001001	00000110	01001000
00000000	00000010	00011000	00001001	00000110	01001000
10000000	10000010	00011000	00001001	00000110	01001000
10000000	10000010	00011000	00001001	00000110	01001000
11100000	10000010	00011000	00001001	00000110	01001000
11110000	10000010	00011000	00001001	00000110	01001000
<\VS-all>

same as VS-all, for compatibility with master file for iXon 285
<VS-allh>
01100000	00000010	00011000	00001001	00000110	01001000
01100000	00000010	00011000	00001001	00000110	01001000
00000000	00000010	00011000	00001001	00000110	01001000
00000000	00000010	00011000	00001001	00000110	01001000
10000000	10000010	00011000	00001001	00000110	01001000
10000000	10000010	00011000	00001001	00000110	01001000
11100000	10000010	00011000	00001001	00000110	01001000
11110000	10000010	00011000	00001001	00000110	01001000
<\VS-all>

122 PPPP     	1E    S  	   DO    	M   1    	  ID L R 	DH2DH X
    3210     	 L    T  	   MB    	G        	  R  K A 	CD BP L
<VH>
11100000	10000010	00011000	00001001	00000010	01001000
11100000	10000010	00011000	00001001	00000010	01001000
11100000	10000010	00011000	00001001	00000010	01001000
11100000	10000010	00011000	00001001	00000010	01001000
11100000	10000010	00011000	00001001	00000010	01001000
11110000	10000010	00011000	00001001	00000010	01001000
<\VH>

<HV>
11100000	10000010	00011000	00001001	00000010	01001000
11100000	10000010	00011000	00001001	00000010	01001000
11100000	10000010	00011000	00001001	00000010	01001000
11100000	10000010	00011000	00001001	00000010	01001000

<ODB>
11100000	10000010	00011000	00001001	00000010	01011000
11100000	10000010	00011000	00001001	00000010	01011000
11100000	10000010	00011000	00001001	00000010	01011000
11100000	10000010	00011000	00001001	00000010	01011000
11100000	10000010	00011000	00001001	00000010	01011000
11110000	10000010	00011000	00001001	00000010	01011000
<\ODB>

Not needed for TX285.
<PDT>
11100000	10000010	00011000	00001001	00000010	01001000
11100000	10000010	00011000	00001001	00000010	01001000
11100000	10000010	00011000	00001001	00000010	01001000
11100000	10000010	00011000	00001001	00000010	01001000
11100000	10000010	00011000	00001001	00000010	01001000
11110000	10000010	00011000	00001001	00000010	01001000
<\PDT>


****************************************************************************************
13.5MHz Starts here

SSIBSSSS 	IS----R- 	---PP--- 	C-- R--- 	--FH-B-F 	ASROS-P-
122 PPPP     	1E    S  	   DO    	M   1    	  ID L R 	DH2DH X
    3210     	 L    T  	   MB    	G        	  R  K A 	CD BP L
<HS2H12.5>
11100000	10101110	00011000	00001001	00000110	11001000
11100000	10101100	00011000	00001001	00000110	11001000
11100000	10101100	00011000	10001001	00000110	11000000
11100000	10101100	00011000	10000001	00000110	01101000
11100000	10101100	00011000	10000001	00000110	01101000
11110000	10101100	00011000	00000001	00000110	00101000
<\HS2H12.5>

<HS-exp2H12.5>
11100000	10101110	00011000	00001001	00000110	11001000
11100000	10101100	00011000	00001001	00000110	11001000
11100000	10101100	00011000	10001001	00000110	11000000
11100000	10101100	00011000	10000001	00000110	01101000
11100000	10101100	00011000	10000001	00000110	01101000
11110000	10101100	00011000	00000001	00000110	00101000
<\HS-exp2H12.5>

11100000	10101100	00011000	00001001	00000110	11001000
11100000	10101100	00011000	10001001	00000110	11000000
11100000	10101100	00011000	10000001	00000110	01101010

11110000	10101100	00011000	00000001	00000110	00101010
<\HS-rd-clk2H12.5>

11100000	10101100	00011000	10000001	00000110	11101000

11100000	10101100	00011000	10000001	00000110	11100000
11100000	10101100	00011000	10000001	00000110	01101010

11110000	10101100	00011000	10000001	00000110	00101010
<\PIXCLK2H12.5>

****************************************************************************************
Baseline Clamp Routines

SSIBSSSS 	IS----R- 	---PP--- 	C-- R--- 	--FH-B-F 	ASROS-P-
122 PPPP     	1E    S  	   DO    	M   1    	  ID L R 	DH2DH X
    3210     	 L    T  	   MB    	G        	  R  K A 	CD BP L
				

<BL-clamp>
11100000	10101110	00001000	00001001	00000010	11001000
11100000	10101100	00001000	00001001	00000010	11001000
11100000	10101100	00001000	10001001	00000010	11000000
11100000	10101100	00001000	10000001	00000010	01101000
11100000	10101100	00001000	10000001	00000010	01101000
11110000	10101100	00001000	00000001	00000010	00101000
<\BL-clamp>
